org.purewidgets.shared.events
Class InputEvent

java.lang.Object
  org.purewidgets.shared.events.InputEvent

public class InputEvent
extends Object

Represents an input event.

Author:
Jorge C. S. Cardoso

Constructor Detail

InputEvent

public InputEvent(WidgetOption widgetOption,
                  ArrayList<String> parameters)
Creates a new InputEvent with the given WidgetOption and parameters. This constructor is used when there is no persona associated (i.e., the input was generated locally at the Gui).

Parameters:
persona - The identity that was responsible for generating the input.
widgetOption - The WidgetOption that was selected by the user.
parameters - The parameters the user sent in the input.

InputEvent

Parameters:
persona - The identity that was responsible for generating the input.
widgetOption - The WidgetOption that was selected by the user.
parameters - The parameters the user sent in the input.
